content:
Announcing SUSHI 0.12.5 with the following fixes:

  • Fixes bug which allowed cardinality to be widened from x..1 to x..*
  • Fixes regular expression used for base64Binary datatype
  • Fixes bug which prevented setting a value on an Instance to the same value fixed by fixed[x] on a StructureDefinition

Release notes: https://github.com/FHIR/sushi/releases/tag/v0.12.5
All works - thanks! Now, If only I can stop myself putting a semicolon at the end of lines (the error messages are quite puzzling!) ...
